Fetch Legislative Yuan Committee Meetings

Source: R/get_ly_committees.R
get_ly_committee_meets.Rd

Retrieves and processes committee meeting information from the Legislative Yuan API.

Usage

get_ly_committee_meets(
  committee_id,
  page = 1,
  per_page = 20,
  term = NULL,
  session = NULL,
  meeting_code = NULL,
  meeting_type = NULL,
  attending_member = NULL,
  date = NULL,
  meeting_number = NULL,
  bill_id = NULL,
  show_progress = TRUE
)

Arguments

committee_id

integer. Required. The ID of the committee

page

integer. Page number for pagination (default: 1)

per_page

integer. Number of items per page (default: 20)

term

integer. Legislative term number

session

integer. Session number

meeting_code

string. Meeting code

meeting_type

string. Type of meeting

attending_member

string. Name of attending member

date

string. Meeting date in YYYY-MM-DD format

meeting_number

string. Meeting number

bill_id

string. Bill ID

show_progress

logical. Whether to display progress bar (default: TRUE)

Value

A list containing metadata and meetings data frame

On this page
